title: POLY-PTX Eco Smart fleece wheel
description:
Generates a shadow-free industrial finish (matting, satin finishing). Also for pre-polishing, removing oxide layers as well as aligning pre-ground sheets and smoothing surfaces.

Features:
- Very high quality non-woven fabric for a particularly long service life
- Ideal speed: 1,000–2,000 min⁻¹
- Maximum speed: 5,000 min⁻¹
- Eco Smart holder for vibration-free work and 100% concentricity
- Price advantage compared to normal tool holders (no costs for inner core, inner sleeves or cast resin)
